file_content.text: The Empire's pride is restored.
Smoke billowing, Exchange smugglers screaming--thank you!
I could see the smoke in Exchange camps from here! Good work!
Here's a little bonus from our discretionary fund. More than worth it if you've brought discipline back to the Imperial army.
Just doing my job.
Now, we can turn our efforts on the Republic...
It was nothing.
That was so beneath me.
However you want to tell the story. I'm just glad it's done.
I want to see that spice burn.
Captain Charles Reskin reporting, my lord.
Captain Charles Reskin reporting, sir.
Bounty Hunter! Captain Charles Reskin here. You look like just the person I need.
The soldiers here, they've been on Tatooine too long. Going native. Sloth, larceny, disrespect for the Imperial code...
Sounds like they could use a reminder of who they serve.
A disgrace.
Sloth, I'm not fond of, but larceny and disrespect both have their place.
So?
Mock our efforts if you like, but there's a job in it for you if you're interested.
Looks like someone buttoned his uniform a little too tight this morning.
Are you always so pompous?
The Empire has a reputation to uphold! Who will fear us when they see these fools?
Not my concern.
It's spice that does it to them. The spice the Exchange has been dealing our soldiers despite my best efforts.
I've sent teams after the dealers before, but they can't get past the Exchange's marksmen.
I need that spice destroyed.
It would be my pleasure.
Certainly.
That spice will be gone in no time.
Consider it done.
Oh, all right.
I just want to see that spice go up in flames.
If you could drive out the smugglers and kill their boss to teach him a lesson, all the better -- but the spice must go.
I'm sorry, I'm busy right now.
